name: Kunaichi
description:
Pitch
    Kunaichi is a platform game in which you play as a kunoichi (ninja woman) who must fight ogres. For this, you have magic kunais. In fact, these weapons can be used to attack, defend or climb. Plus, they come back when you want them to. But be careful, you only have seven of them. Distribute them well between the different functions to advance through the different levels.

Controls

  • ZQSD or WASD to move
  • Left Click to shoot a shuriken
  • Right Click to extend your shield
  • Spacebar to callback your shurikens
  • LeftShift to run
  • R to open the menu
